record.title: APPOINTMENT OF ACTING PRESIDENT PRO TEMPORE
record.chair: The clerk will please read a communication to the Senate from the President pro tempore (Mr. Byrd).

speaking.paragraph: I suggest the absence of a quorum and ask unanimous consent that the time be charged equally against both sides.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
